info.name: NestJS Chat App
info.description:
This Postman collection provides a set of API requests for interacting with the NestJS-based chat application. It is designed to facilitate development, testing, and exploration of the various features offered by the chat app.

Repository: [https://github.com/hamzah-mifta/nestjs-chat-app](https://github.com/hamzah-mifta/nestjs-chat)

response.name: 400 - Email already registered

exec: // Check that the response status is 200
// Check if the 'userId' field is present in the response body

request.description:
### POST /v1/auth/login

This endpoint is used to authenticate a user and obtain an access token.

#### Request Headers

- `Socket-Id` (string): The socket id from client-side listener. Used for identify the sender when private message sent to other user.
    

#### Request Body

- `email` (string): The email address of the user.
    
- `password` (string): The password of the user.
    

#### Response

- `success` (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- `statusCode` (integer): The status code of the response.
    
- `message` (string): A message related to the response.
    
- `data.accessToken` (string): The access token obtained upon successful authentication.

response.name: 400 - Empty email

request.description:
### Broadcast Message

This endpoint allows you to broadcast a message to all chat participants.

**Request Body**

- message (string, required): The message to be broadcasted.
    

#### Response

- success (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- statusCode (integer): The status code of the response.
    
- message (string): Any additional message related to the response.
    
- data (object): The data returned in the response, which is null in this case.
